Class UdpUnderlay

java.lang.Object
underlay.Underlay

public class UdpUnderlay extends Underlay
udp underlay implementation.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_PACKET_SIZE

      public static final int MAX_PACKET_SIZE
      The nature of udp requires us to predefine the maximum size of a packet that could be transferred. This parameter defines the maximum size of a packet in bytes.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

      protected boolean initUnderlay​(int port)
      Creates a udp socket at the given port and starts listening it.
      Specified by:
      initUnderlay in class Underlay
      Parameters:
      port - the port that the underlay should be bound to.
      Returns:
      whether the initialization was successful.

    • sendMessage

      public boolean sendMessage​(String address, int port, Request request)
      Sends an udp request the given address. The size of the request in bytes cannot exceed the size defined in `UDPUtils.MAX_PACKET_SIZE`.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in class Underlay
      Parameters:
      address - address of the remote server.
      port - port of the remote server.
      request - request to send.
      Returns:
      the response emitted by the server.

    • terminate

      public boolean terminate​(String address, int port)
      Terminates the underlay by unbinding the listener from the port.
      Specified by:
      terminate in class Underlay
      Returns:
      whether the termination was successful.
